modName: Miranda and Mikal - Two Followers that can Shout
summary: Miranda and Mikal are siblings. Miranda is older by a couple years. They were always very close, and ever since they heard of the Greybeards, they knew they wanted to learn the way of the voice.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ln7i1c.jpg[/IMG]

Miranda and Mikal are siblings. Miranda is older by a couple years. They were always very close, and ever since they heard of the Greybeards, they knew they wanted to learn the way of the voice. They know most of the shouts I could give them. They can be found in Vilemyr Inn, Ivarstead. It was very difficult to get pictures of them shouting, so I recorded a few videos in Fraps:

[youtube]mS1E6gH2Vd8[/youtube]  [youtube]_DRFabKO0Rg[/youtube]

Here's a video of them killing a random dragon we encountered:

[youtube]W3XrpDJhd2M[/youtube]

[b]This mod requires Apachii Skyhair.[/b]

Both of them know the same shouts. Mikal also knows fire spells, Miranda knows ice spells. They don't know the ice form shout because they used it too much. It was hilarious, but would probably be very annoying in combat.

Credit goes to Bethesda and Apachii.
author: FXM420
